## Introduction

This workflow will be used to build up vignettes of individual
genes in collaboration with Jeff Harder who is working with the
three bears data.

```{r load_code}
is.interactive = FALSE
#is.interactive = TRUE
library("here")

all.fun <- list.files(here("Code"), full.names = TRUE, pattern = ".R")
for(i in 1:length(all.fun)){source(all.fun[i])}
```

```{r load_libraries, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, error = FALSE}
all.packages <- c("pheatmap", "gprofiler2", "igraph")
load_libraries(all.packages, personal.library = TRUE)
```

```{r set_var}
tissue.names <- c("Adipose", "Islet", "Liver", "SkeletalMuscle")
gene.cols <- categorical_pal(8)

jeff.genes <- c("Pnpla2", "Mogat2", "Hadha", "Cpt2", "Capn3")
```


```{r load_data}
exp.name = "tissue_together-_-complete_mediation-germline_kinship"
pop.local.mge <- readRDS(here("Results", "High_Dim_Med", exp.name, "Population_Local_MGE_local_imp.RDS"))
pop.distal.mge <- readRDS(here("Results", "High_Dim_Med", exp.name, "Population_Distal_MGE_local_imp.RDS"))
```


```{r genes, fig.width = 10, fig.height = 5}

gene.table <- gconvert(jeff.genes, organism = "mmusculus")

gene.distal.mge.table <- gene.local.mge.table <- NULL
for(g in 1:nrow(gene.table)){
	gene.name <- gene.table[g,"input"]
	gene.id <- gene.table[g,"target"]
	
	gene.distal.mge <- sapply(pop.distal.mge, function(x) if(length(which(names(x) == gene.id)) > 0){x[which(names(x) == gene.id)]}else{0})
	names(gene.distal.mge) <- tissue.names
	gene.distal.mge.table <- rbind(gene.distal.mge.table, gene.distal.mge)

	gene.local.mge <- sapply(pop.local.mge, function(x) if(length(which(names(x) == gene.id)) > 0){x[which(names(x) == gene.id)]}else{0})
	names(gene.local.mge) <- tissue.names	
	gene.local.mge.table <- rbind(gene.local.mge.table, gene.local.mge)
	
}

rownames(gene.distal.mge.table) <- rownames(gene.local.mge.table) <- gene.table[,"input"]

barplot(gene.local.mge.table, beside = TRUE, col = gene.cols[1:nrow(gene.table)], main = "Local MGE")
legend("topright", fill = gene.cols[1:nrow(gene.table)], legend = gene.table[,"input"], cex = 0.7)

barplot(gene.distal.mge.table, beside = TRUE, col = gene.cols[1:nrow(gene.table)], main = "Distal MGE")
legend("topright", fill = gene.cols[1:nrow(gene.table)], legend = gene.table[,"input"], cex = 0.7)
```

How large are these MGE values?
For each gene in each tissue, we looked at how many genes met or exceeded the MGE 
of the gene.

```{r rel_mge, fig.width = 4, fig.height = 4}
pop.distal.mge.percentile <- matrix(NA, nrow = nrow(gene.distal.mge.table), ncol = ncol(gene.distal.mge.table))
pop.local.mge.percentile <- matrix(NA, nrow = nrow(gene.local.mge.table), ncol = ncol(gene.local.mge.table))
dimnames(pop.distal.mge.percentile) <- dimnames(pop.local.mge.percentile) <- dimnames(gene.distal.mge.table)

for(tx in 1:length(tissue.names)){

    distal.pos.idx <- which(gene.distal.mge.table[,tx] > 0)
    distal.neg.idx <- which(gene.distal.mge.table[,tx] < 0)

    if(length(distal.pos.idx) > 0){
        pos.gene.perc <- 1 - sapply(gene.distal.mge.table[distal.pos.idx,tx], function(x) length(which(pop.distal.mge[[tx]] >= x))/length(pop.distal.mge[[tx]]))
        pop.distal.mge.percentile[distal.pos.idx,tx] <- pos.gene.perc
    }

    if(length(distal.neg.idx) > 0){
        neg.gene.perc <- 1 - sapply(gene.distal.mge.table[distal.neg.idx,tx], function(x) length(which(pop.distal.mge[[tx]] <= x))/length(pop.distal.mge[[tx]]))
        pop.distal.mge.percentile[distal.neg.idx,tx] <- neg.gene.perc
    }

    #also look at local percentiles
    local.pos.idx <- which(gene.local.mge.table[,tx] > 0)
    local.neg.idx <- which(gene.local.mge.table[,tx] < 0)

   if(length(local.pos.idx) > 0){
        pos.gene.perc <- 1 - sapply(gene.local.mge.table[local.pos.idx,tx], function(x) length(which(pop.local.mge[[tx]] >= x))/length(pop.local.mge[[tx]]))
        pop.local.mge.percentile[local.pos.idx,tx] <- pos.gene.perc
    }

    if(length(local.neg.idx) > 0){
        neg.gene.perc <- 1 - sapply(gene.local.mge.table[local.neg.idx,tx], function(x) length(which(pop.local.mge[[tx]] <= x))/length(pop.local.mge[[tx]]))
        pop.local.mge.percentile[local.neg.idx,tx] <- neg.gene.perc
    }

}

pheatmap(pop.local.mge.percentile, display_numbers = TRUE, cluster_cols = FALSE, cluster_rows = FALSE,
    main = "local MGE percentile")

pheatmap(pop.distal.mge.percentile, display_numbers = TRUE, cluster_cols = FALSE, cluster_rows = FALSE,
    main = "Distal MGE percentile")

```
